website_summaries.verdict: A deluxe stroller that boasts a removable rear seat that converts the stroller into a sit-and-stand option.
pros: Offers a large basket for storage
Easy to clean with mild household soap or detergent and warm water
Designed for children who weigh up to 40 pounds
Stroller allows one child up front and one behind who can either sit or stand up
cons: Items in the storage area may get stuck in the stroller's wheels at times

customer_reviews.title: Damaged tire
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the price and quality of this stroller until one of the front wheels got squished and damaged by the own stroller as we folded it to put in the car . If you don't straighten out the wheels to face straight /forward , you will damage the wheels ! This is a hassle , now I have to call baby trend and ask them if I can purchase a replacement front wheels before this damaged wheel becomes non functional.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy from the past!
customer_reviews.text: This is kinda delayed, as i bought this stroller over a year ago, and after having it for this long and using it almost daily, i have to say well worth the money, my oldest just started using the stand up and ride part in the back and he loves it. It allows him to stand and ride or sit on the "bench" part that is left from where the stroller seat was.. Would buy this product again if i was to need one, but the original is still doing great!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie And Krystal Syrie

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller at a great price
customer_reviews.text: We have a 2.5 year old and a 3 month old. Needed a double stroller and chose this one based on the reviews. I was a little leery because it’s so inexpensive but so far we are very happy with it! As others have said many brands of infant car seats will fit but won’t necessarily click in. But there’s a strap so you can secure it. Our Chico Keyfit fits fine. We recently took this on vacation and it survived being gate checked at the airport twice and frequently being shoved in and out trunks. It’s also really easy to open and close. we are very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lolaloo22

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller,. It's a little bit big but that totally expected since it's double stroller. I use it in airports,walking in museums, and parks. My fifth and three years kids so comfortable with it.they spend 10 hours minimum riding it and it was good, they slept comfortably. The only thing didn't help me alot is the basket has its access between the kids I loaded it with 3 backpacks and 2 kids ... Almost 100 LB It fits my Toyota's Camry trunk with 2 small bags. Looks heavyweight but not heavy while pushing. Moving easily. It folds and opens easily . Five star product and I advice every mom to get it .
customer_reviews.author: Boushra

customer_reviews.title: Great double stroller
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stroller. This price is great and assembly was super easy. It’s not that heavy so lifting and lower out of vehicle is no problem. I’m over 50 and it’s no chore. This thing is long but I live in Japan and it does fit the elevator so it’s manageable. I like the fact I can lock a car seat to either seat. Pros Easy to use and versatile Price under $200 Fairly light Easy to maneuver Cons Solid wheels and odd tread which on smooth surface is wobbly Brakes are really stiff to unlock When folding the front wheels need to be turned so it closes. Overall I would recommend this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: G. SMITH

customer_reviews.title: My two year old does like to run around and I usually put my newborn ...
customer_reviews.text: I never wanted a double stroller, but got this as a gift. With a two year old and an infant we have used it a few times. My two year old does like to run around and I usually put my newborn in a baby carrier. When we have used it, it rides smoothly and gets the job done. Downsides are length (this thing is so long...but I think a lot of double strollers are) and I don't like the basket underneath. If both kids are in it, the basket is hard to access. The two cup holders is very nice though!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Heyde

customer_reviews.title: This stroller is a steal!
customer_reviews.text: Buy this! I’ve done an endless amount of research on double strollers and most are extremely overpriced and impractical size-wise. This stroller is an amazing bargain and a perfect size for everyday tasks like grocery shopping and errands. Lightweight, easy to steer, good storage under, baby car seat snaps in easily, folds up quickly and fits great in the back of my SUV. I highly recommend this stroller and the Baby Trend brand. It’s worked wonderfully and I have 2 babies under 14 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: so far I am SUPER impressed with this stroller. Easy to handle. Easy to steer. It is quite heavy, but it's a double stroller. You almost have to expect it. My 3 yr old and 6 month old love it. I live on a back country road where it's half gravel half paved and it maneuvers beautifully. I'm 5'5" and the handle is at a perfect height. The storage stretches underneath the top seat and all to under the front seat. Don't expect to store a ton, granted I was able to put my big diaper bag in there.
customer_reviews.author: CoburnFarmhouse

customer_reviews.title: Good tandem stroller
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the teal and black but received the Grey and green. Too big and heavy to hassle with returning, but that's why I removed one of the stars. I was surprised at the amount of space between the front and back seats. This will be really nice as both of my kids run tall. The structure and build is pretty sturdy and the seat adjustments are simple. Overall I decent stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F.

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller/measure before buying!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my granddaughters. 19 months and 7 months. Works great! This is a wonderful stroller! Very well made and sturdy! The only con is they weight of it. Also... Make sure you measure your trunk! I can not stress that enough! It is a long stroller when collapsed and was too big to put in my son in-laws car trunk. Luckily it fits (barely) in my daughter's car. I thought for sure we would have to send this back but we got it to fit with just a slight turn adjustment! So check the dimensions of your trunk and specifications of the stroller before purchasing! Otherwise...I highly recommend this stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: This is not the best stroller. It is hard to control after a ...
customer_reviews.text: After using this stroller over a year, I can confidently say, it gets the job done. This is not the best stroller. It is hard to control after a while. I've used mine for almost a year and a half, and the wheels are getting wonky. It's not made for any terrain that is not smooth. You can take it to the store, push it across the parking lot, but anything else is gonna give you problems. This will not be a super long term stroller, I can tell. But if you're looking for a budget friendly double stroller, this one is as good as it gets!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Works well for bigger kids and their baby siblings
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5 year old that surprisingly fits very well in the stroller seat. She climbs out and in with ease and her legs rest comfortable on the front seat's foot rail. My 18 month old also fits well into the back seat. When filled with kids and their junk the stroller is still remarkably easy to steer and maneuver much better than our other strollers. It folds up easy and isn't too heavy lifting in and out of the truck. It takes up a lot more space than a single stroller does but then again you should expect it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble, light, and easy to steer. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough how much I LOVE this stroller. We had the BabyTrend side-by-side and it was just too wide for shopping. This one is PERFECT. Definitely NOT heavy like I read other people saying. It’s so much lighter and smaller than the side-by-side. It was a piece of cake to put together. No tools needed. Everything just pops/locks right in. All you have to assemble is the wheels, a canopy, and one tray. Literally took maybe 5 minutes. For this price I wouldn’t mind having another. I would have paid more for it!!! Awesome stroller. Don’t let the negative reviews scare you away. There’s nothing negative about this stroller. JUST BUY IT. You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's nice but not the best.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice and sturdily double stroller but it's so heavy and hard to open and close. Also is pretty bulky, hardly fits in my compact car trunk so I wouldn't recommend if you only own compact cars.. the seat belts are weird and the cup tray is also hard to function.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Cardoso

customer_reviews.title: Great for amusement parks or long walks
customer_reviews.text: We used this stroller for our Disney World trip and for long walks. Our kids are 1 & 5. It worked out perfectly. My only issue is when we took the shade cover off the back, the whole section comes out. Our 5 year old uses the seat but doesn't have anything to rest his back on. He's too tall to have the cover attached.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is great for the young couple with two little ones. It holds the car seat of the youngest and allows great seating for the older one. It is going to be great as the kids grow. It is very sturdy and folds up to fit the back of an SUV. It is bulky, but that can't be avoided when seating two. It was a gift for my son's family and he is a stickler for quality. He loves it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Land

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed to find out that my graco car seat can ...
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed to find out that my graco car seat can only attach to the rear of the stroller and not on the front like I had thought. We were also sent to the stroller with one of the child trays missing but after contacting babytrend they sent us a new one right away. Over all a good stroller and pretty easy to push around and get through stores and busy public places considering how big it is to fit two kids.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Good double stroller for the price but the front seat ...
customer_reviews.text: Good double stroller for the price but the front seat is really small. My kids would kind of slide out a little especially my 4 year old. The sun visor doesn't provide much shade in the front either. The storage basket is hard to use and small because the rear seat kind of takes up space and you have to reach in between the two seats to get stuff out. For what it costs it does the basics of what needs to be done but I really want a different stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Iesha K.

customer_reviews.title: Really love this love stroller
customer_reviews.text: Really love this love stroller. It works well on my 3 months old twins. Set up was really easy unlike the graco duoglider and the stroller looks really sturdy and stylish. Only thing it wasn’t able to do was fit my car seats, but oh well , i can easily and securely attach my babies in there with no problem. Awesome stroller overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this stroller so badly because we have all baby trend product but this stroller fell short. It is extremely heavy and extremely difficult to turn and take off of blacktop cemented sidewalks. I have to take it to the zoo because I have two kids under two and by the time I’m finished at the zoo my arm muscles ache because I spend so much time trying to turn and maneuver this stroller around. If you take it on anything but cement walkways or blacktop, you will be working super hard to push it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlynn Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality awesome price!!
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful!! I have one of these already before I bought this one. The one I have doesn't have the actual back seat. This one does! It has two canopy and my other just had the one over the front seat. This one is bigger but that's ok! The wheels are a little larger too and it seems to roll very smoothly! I saw someone else saying something about quality, they must have gotten a dud bc quality is amazing for the price. I'm a long time baby trend purchaser. I have car seats and strollers and they have held up for years for me and my babies! Love, love, love my new stroller!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stroller to use with my 4 year old and two year old, while wearing my newborn. With that load, it was important to have a stoller that is easy to maneuver - and this one fit the bill. I can easily turn the turn stroller with just one hand, and it folds away for storage easily, as well. Beneath the seats is a large storage area - great for diaper bags and all the blankets, drinks, and snacks I need.
customer_reviews.author: lynee.ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about the stroller so far. It was super easy to put together (Just click the wheels in and put the back canopy on). It maneuvers beautifully. The only thing I can complain about is the weight...but it is a DOUBLE stroller so that is expected, it is common sense compared to a single stroller I have been used to! It folds down quickly and easily. I still have not used the stand option in the back mainly because I lost my instructions on how to change the seating options lol, but that is my fault totally. Overall, this is a great product and well worth the price. Shipping came at a pretty decent time, too
customer_reviews.author: renae

customer_reviews.title: Major back wheel drag.
customer_reviews.text: Although this stroller seems like a great idea, I loved the built in universal car seat adapters, the grow as your child grows (standing feature), the nice right folding position that felt sturdy and you had places to grab. This would have worked perfectly for us expect it didn't roll very nicely, it seemed as though something was always dragging and slowing me down. They should have put more money into the wheels so they would glide nicely. I also would have liked bigger sun shades, they move so you are able to follow the sun but it then leaves a gap. I ended up returning because of the "drag" that was a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: iisstill

customer_reviews.title: Prefer this to my double jogging stroller- so versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I love how many options and combinations of seating there is with this stroller. You can have 2 car seats, 2 seats, a seat and a sit to stand. It's awesome! I walk the neighborhood and the side walk is very uneven but the wheels on this hold up great! My toddler loves the tray with the cupholder. I have a double jogging stroller and this is better because it fits my infant, takes up less space in my car trunk, and has more storage. The price is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a life saver!!! Having two stollers is just too much this is great and click connect car seat compatible. I like how each seat can be seat to any age level for it because a have kids 2 years apart and these younger ages 2 years is the diference between just being able to sit in the seat without clicking her car seat in and the other one going from wnating to walk to sit constantly. Makes everything much easier to say the least!
customer_reviews.author: RJ Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stroller for the price. Pros: -Not that heavy to carry around -Spacious and comfy -No problems whatsoever with safety (belts etc) -Must have in places like theme parks. -Generous storage compartment Cons: -Space consuming. I have a Nissan Pathfinder and it consumes almost half the surface space in trunk with my third row folded. I think it might be impossible to fit inside a compact sedan. -The canopy for the back seat can sometimes pose to be tedious. I need to remove it everytime I need to load the stroller into my vehicle's trunk. (Because the canopy protrudes too much that I can't close the lift gate) -
customer_reviews.author: SoCalUser

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler and infant
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is honestly amazing. I have a 3 year old tall toddler and an infant and they both fit great. Car seat clips in nicely (it’s the same brand) and my son has a lot of leg room which is why I was hesitant to buy it. His feet doesn’t touch the floor like his other single stroller. It folds easily and nicely. Haven’t tried the stand part yet but I won’t be needing that add on.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: My toddler was sliding out of the front seat and his legs were too long for the foot rest (he’s only 2.5) my infant’s car seat didn’t fit in either seat (Graco snigride click connect). The stroller is massive and took up the entire back of my RAV4 and was so heavy. We returned it after walking around with it for 20 minutes. It maneuvers easily but that didn’t really matter considering neither of my kids were comfortable. The stroller has a lot of great features but that doesn’t really matter if I can’t lift it and neither of my kids can ride in it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! Although it is big and bulky it’s exactly what I needed for my twins. The assembly is easy and it fits in my trunk. The stroller is what I was looking for to travel with and for the kids to grow with the stroller
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: It’s Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, it holds my daughters car seat in the back while my son sits in the front. The seat in the front seems small. When my son is in the seat he slouches as to lay back. When he does that he doesn’t have much seat, he looks as if he is going to fall out. He never does since he’s buckled, and I don’t know if it changes anything but he’s 18 months old and his sister is a newborn which is why she is in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquilynn Calvert

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller for the price. Needed something I could use on occasion (so didn’t want to spend a fortune) for my 2yo and 2mo children and this works great. My Britax car seat isn’t officially compatible but fits in just fine and I don’t find it to wobble or fear it will fall out. Stroller is a bit heavy when lifting into the car and it will only fit in our full size SUV even when folded up. It would never fit into our sedan’s trunk. But again, with those things in mind it is a great stroller for the price. Have only used once or twice in the months I’ve had it but happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: I've only used the stroller once but I really like it. The wheels move easily while out on ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the stroller once but I really like it. The wheels move easily while out on our walk. It was a little confusing figuring out how to put a rear facing car seat in since it's supposed to "lock" into place. I think maybe because I am using an Eddie Bauer car seat instead of Baby Trend? The stroller is heavier than a single stroller, but I expected that.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Stroller Made for 2
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as gift. Pros: Sturdy, easily assembled, large bottom bin, cup holders, nice canopies. Cons: Small child must be in front if older one standing, but the front seat is too big for infant. Best at 3/4+ months. The front seat is probably too small for 2 yo. Does not recline enough for either to sleep. Asked CS why teeth on only one side of mystery zipper in photo. Answer "the zipper is found on the seat." ? Still have no idea.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap made, straps cut into legs,  wheels fall off
customer_reviews.text: Strongly dislike. The front 2 wheels fall off of it everytime we go to open it up. Contacted the company and they sent us only one replacement wheel which still didn't fix the issue. The straps are horribly designed. They cut into our babies legs even after being adjusted. Wish this wasn't so heavy and large or it would be returned. Not happy with this product at all!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller. But i wish the front set reclined more so when they baby is sleeping she isn't sitting straight up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tandem stroller
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to maneuver for a double stroller. My 3yo likes to sit in the back and my 10 month old loves the view from the front. The trays are great. The cup holder is wide enough to hold my toddlers Camelback sippy cup while most that I've tried don't. It's heavy but expected since it feels very sturdy. Wheels are big enough that it glides over cracks and small holes on the sidewalks.
customer_reviews.author: MamaC

customer_reviews.title: Good for bigger cars like an suv or truck.
customer_reviews.text: We have a newer fusion and it doesn’t fit in our trunk. It’s kinda hard to fold up . & the bigger kid has to sit in the back or it’s really hard to steer. The little compartment at the top of the stroller is decent size . We fit our keys and payment method in it but our phones didn’t fit. I like the cup holders though ! It also has decent storage for under the stroller , but it’s kinda hard to get to unless you are using it tandem style; which is also kinda tricky to get the seat off and figure out . But good for walking around !
customer_reviews.author: Nate Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Won't fit in a car!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stroller for my 1 1/2 year old and 4 month old and it's almost perfect. Both seats are roomy and they seem to be comfortable for the kids however the only complaint I have is that this stroller is super heavy. I'm a small person but this thing is almost as big as me even folded, thank goodness I drive an sub instead of a car bc it would not fit!. I just wish they could have designed it with lighter material and made it to where it would fold a little more compact. Other than that the stroller is well made and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: landwalker

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller!
customer_reviews.text: We love this stroller! My 2 year old wants to sit in the front and I reclined the seat back and put my 3 month old in the back! Plenty of room, sturdy and super easy to assemble. Love that it comes with trays on the 2 seats and 1 for the parent as well. Seems to have plenty of storage room underneath . Pushed it sown my dirt road and it seems to roll fine. Sturdy, nice material and a great price point. Super satisfied with this purchasea
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: We use this stroller easily every single day
customer_reviews.text: A LIFESAVER for 2 kids 2 and under. We use this stroller easily every single day. It also only takes 10-15 minutes to change it from a seated stroller to the sit/stand portion, so that's REALLY nice. Easy to fold up and down, sturdy wheels, comfortable seats (according to my 2 year old so.. take that with a grain of salt ;) ), really easy to snap my newborns carseat into place. I was hesitant on spending the money, and it's one purchase that I'd make over and over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My second son is going to be born next January, checked out big retailers like Walmart, Target and Costco, it’s either too pricey, or too bulky. Searched and compared on Amazon for two months, we then decided to get this one. It’s actually not much bigger than the single seat stroller and the weight is perfect. Although the instructions booklet is kind of unclear, but it can be figured out easily, the assembly is quite easy. And other brand car seat latch onto the stroller perfectly. This is a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lovefromoversea

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The Chicco KeyFit 30 DOES NOT WORK with this stroller. It does not lock into anything but rather sits very unsecuurely on a plastic piece. This stroller DOES NOT FIT IN A STANDARD SUV TRUNK. I have a Ford Escape and you have to remove the canopy and lower the handlebar to wedge it in there. The wheels must be positioned perfectly for it to fold closed. Overall an awful stroller. You definitely get what you pay for here. I returned it for a Chicco Cortina Together.
customer_reviews.author: Vikram Mittal

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble but very bulky for storage and transportation. I have to force this into my mid-size SUV. My toddler is 32” tall and she is very crunched when in either seat. I find this stroller fine for the price point of $120 considering it serves a basic purpose, but it is hard to maneuver for trips to the zoo or longer walks. Wish I would have saved my money and gone with a side by side at higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Measure your trunk!!
customer_reviews.text: Incan highly recommend this stroller...if you have a VERY large trunk. I have a Ford Escape and stuffed it in a couple times but haven’t managed to fit it in there for the last 3 months (I had to buy another double stroller, from Zoe). But for the price and ability to click in an infant seat, it’s a good choice!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn K

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this stroller. Only flaw for us is the back seat sun shade is restrictive. It only goes out as far as in the picture, so we have to make sure we always have a blanket with us to use as a shield. Easy fix if we don't forget the blanket. Also my older son (2 yrs old) has to sit in the back seat because his feet hang over in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Waz

customer_reviews.title: Overall this is a great double stroller for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a 2 year old and a new born. I like how you can just drop the table and snap the car seat for the new born on the back. Makes it easy to keep an eye on the baby. Other double strollers will only allow you to put the car seat on the front seat. This stroller gives you the option for both. Also it will transform as the kids grow, so we will hopefully get years of use. The only con is if a 35lb 2 year old is sitting in the front seat it can be a little difficult to steer. But overall this is a great double stroller for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mlegasse

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have bought this sooner
customer_reviews.text: I waiting until my second child was 8 months before purchasing this and I wish I would have gotten it sooner. It makes doing everything with two young kids much easier. I was worried her baby car seat (chicco) wouldn't fit another brand but it snugly fits right in the top section with no issues. This stroller has so many options for standing or sitting. So far it has been a great purchase and would recommend for any family of multiples.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Long

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for people with 2 young kids!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my friend who has a newborn and 1 year old. She says it is an absolute life saver. She doesn't go anywhere without it. She has had it for a year now so with a 1 and 2 yr old it helps to keep the kids contained. You can use the 2 seats it comes with or take them out and use car seats. So versatile to fit your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Abird

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter and son-in-law. They have three children, one is an infant and one is a five year old that wears orthotics. Finding a reasonably priced stroller for the baby and the five year old to share was a challenge, but this one seems to do the trick. They're all happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold and unfold good quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this stroller so easy to fold and unfold, my 4 and 2 year old air comfortably and is easy to maneuver! We used it first at SeaWorld long day and this stroller was a trooper! Definitely good quality well worth the money super affordable. Love the storage underneath the seat and how many colors holders It has! I believe it has 6! I will edit soon with pictures! I recommend this product you will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Witchy mom

customer_reviews.title: Wheels need to be in just the right position to fold it.
customer_reviews.text: I'll just start off with the worst part. The wheels have to be in just the right position for this to fold up correctly. Extremely annoying and just a poor design when it comes to that. The seats were fine though and were big/small enough for a 1.5yo up to a 5yo. I do wish the visors were larger. They didn't actually give much shade. It's not a terrible double stroller by any means, just annoying and frustrating when trying to fold it for storage.
customer_reviews.author: LS2018

customer_reviews.title: Does not collapse flat easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my niece who have a 2 and a 1 year old. Good quality and price - seems sturdy. Light enough to easily put in the trunk. However, as other reviewers have noted, the front wheel does not align properly when collapsing it and hence it's always a struggle in folding it flat so it can be loaded in the trunk. It is also bulky. We had a double stroller a long time ago with my kids and I was able to put that in the trunk and still have space left for a bag of groceries.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great double stroller
customer_reviews.text: Bought this stroller for m two grandbabies. They both fit and still have plenty of room to move around if they choose to. Lots of room for them to grown into as well, the securing straps are easy to adjust and the forward seat can recline a bit. The bottom storage are is to small for a large diaper bag but there is enough room for smaller items. Overall I am very content with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Affordable. Built strong. Functional.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver. It really is like something you would see in the movie Transformers. We have a newb, 2 & 4 year old. This really has the perfect combinations for whatever scenario we are in. It fits almost as snuggly as our single stroller did in our car. Also, not to heavy to lift into the car. It is not too wide. Easy to navigate inside places. It fits our older Graco carseat for the baby. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great value & straight forward
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great double with easy function. It doesn’t fold up all that small so we do have to take off the shades when putting it in my car (2018 Ford Explorer), but it’s really not so bad. It’s well built and sturdy. Plenty of room for both of my kids, who are 1 and 2.5. We do a lot of theme parks and this fits the new Disney restrictions for strollers. Doesn’t maneuver as well as, say, a BOB stroller, but it rolls pretty well and has plenty of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for 2 heavy children
customer_reviews.text: Nice stroller, but I have very heavy kids. 42lb and 30lb. This does make it difficult to maneuver. You need less weight in the front to be able to turn easily. Will say baby trend was great to work with after the grips on the handle split less than a month after purchasing. They sent me a brand new one. I don't like that I can't fit my diaper bag into the storage under the seats. This just isn't functional. My son does have shorter legs and there really isn't much room for him in the back seat. Front seat is not very deep either. But I can fold it with one hand!
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Hard to maneuver with heavier kid in the front
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is easy to open and fold, but very hard to maneuver with my toddler (31lbs) in the front and baby (13lbs) in the back. Perhaps when the baby gets bigger, I can put her in the front and it would be easier. We have only tried one configuration so far, so I'll have to update my review if another configuration works better. Also, it is very annoying that my water bottle, nor my daughter's kid sized water bottle fit in the water bottle holders. My daughters seem pretty content with their rides, though...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy double stroller.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my newborn and 2 year old. Worked perfectly and fit in the back of a mini van. In my new Chevy Traverse it does not fit. I have to put down the third seat to make it fit. Other than it not fitting in my newer car it’s a great stroller for twins or for a baby and toddler combo.
customer_reviews.author: JS03

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for twins
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is the best. This my very first time writing a review on amazon but I must say my boys love when I take them for their morning walk and evening walk. It’s perfect and easy to fold. A little big for a small person like me but hey I’m still alive. It’s adjustable to fit the age and size of my boys and i love it. It’s even perfect since I got the baby trend car seats for them so it’s just perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tamika barnes

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall
customer_reviews.text: In general like this product. I will say my two year old doesn’t have a ton of space in the front seat for her bottom or her feet. The seat is very shallow which pushes her legs out further leaving her little to no room for her feet/legs. Also it’s difficult to collapse you seem to have to roll it backwards before collapsing it so the front wheel had the smaller section towards you. It definitely works and is a good product for what we needed just some minor flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am really liking this double stroller. It is big but what double stroller isn’t? I have no difficulty folding it and putting it in the back of my Prius V. I have a Chicco Keyfit 30 car seat which doesn’t snap in but sits snugly in place and I use the buckle across the top. The stroller is long and can feel cumbersome at times but I expected this. Overall it was a great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: I love it so much
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble it comes almost complete except a visor and the wheels. It also has a little peek window in the visor closest to the handle so you can peak at your kid without interruption. It’s a net that has a velcros shut. Also has wheel locks cup holders and a basket on bottom for storage
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Lee

customer_reviews.title: Double Stroller
customer_reviews.text: This stroller was able to fit two 4 year old boys, we used as two normal stroller seats! we used this for our Disney vacation, so it does fit in their guidelines of new stroller rules.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller. There are many different options for sitting and standing. We used an infant seat with it and it worked great. We have taken it off road and it held up great. We uses it at max weight limit and it was still easy to push. It is very lightweight compared to many doubles. It seems comfortable-at least no one has complained. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Mommashu

customer_reviews.title: Workable options
customer_reviews.text: Very useful. I purchased to go with a 2014 britax car seat when my second was born. Decent stroller for the price. Very long when folded, I doubt this would fit in the trunk of a normal sedan. Also it is heavy. Not a bad purchase for the money. Would recommend, but make sure you have room in your vehicle to transport it. Also, I had to read the instructions to figure out how to use all of the variations, but once you do it a couple of times you get it. I like the storage basket underneath and the built in cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie G

customer_reviews.title: Great value and product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value for the price! Holds an infant car seat, folds very easy and very strong construction. It is heavy, but it is a double stroller - you cant beat the price\value. It made it through 2 flights gate checking with no issues (no bag to protect it)
customer_reviews.author: phliff

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Must have with baby #2. However I should have done more research. Does NOT work with Britax car seats. I still kept it though because it's that great of a stroller
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We’ve use this on daily walks and multiple vacations/plane rides, it’s amazing and we’ve gotten our money’s worth x10. Would buy again or as a gift. We have a single Bob and tried the double bob but for regular walking this is more comfortable for the kids and the single profile makes taking it places easy, though stealing is like driving a boat in sharp corners.
customer_reviews.author: SanFran Mom1876

customer_reviews.title: Happy strolling!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I got this stroller. It’s a wonderful investment for our family. My toddler sits upfront and baby in the back seat that reclines more. I didn’t need to use a car seat. It folds nicely and stands. Easy to maneuver and good suspension.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia De Leon

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for a 7th month old and a 3 year old. I checked out many strollers and reviews and I have to say that this is a great buy. A lady in the grocery store had this and said it is the best. I agree! It took me about 20 minutes to assemble. My little one sits up front while my older child sits directly behind. So far I've only set it up as a double stroller. Can't wait to set it up for our 3 year old to ride standing. Pros: attractive, sturdy, lots of room for storage. Only con: heavy to pick up (which would be expected, considering it is a double stroller).
customer_reviews.author: MusicLover

customer_reviews.title: Nice at first but not convenient to actually use
customer_reviews.text: I loved this stroller at first. It arrived pretty much assembled already we just had to add the wheels. It navigates well and feels very smooth. But we cannot keep this stroller. It can’t fit in our Chevy Trax unless we take off both trays and remove the wheels and shove it in long ways which is digging holes in my cars ceiling. I don’t have to tell you how inconvient that is but maybe it’s my fault for having a smaller SUV. The other part I hate is you can’t get to the basket easily at all. My big kid has to rest her legs on top of my diaper bag..
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great stroller for the price. I have a 2 month old, a 3.5 year old and sometimes I have my 4 month old. It has plenty of cup holders.All combinations of kids works great in the stroller. I would definitely buy it again. I just wish it maneuvered better in really tight places and it could have better stoage
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great price, pushes easy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We have a britax carseat and i feel confident with it closer to me vs in the front since it fits more securely in that seat. My kids are 3 and 10m old we have had stroller for a few weeks, i love it! It replaced a different tandem stroller that had 0 trays, cupholders etc, and my 3 yr old didnt have a sun shade. Both kids are happy in this stroller cant wait to take them out and about more! It fits in my sedan ok, and folding can be a bit tricky just make sure the front wheels are sideways
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it does not fold easily. And
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is very heavy and bulky, making it quite burdensome to load into a vehicle or maneuver through small spaces. Steering this stroller, in general, is difficult due to its weight, especially when it's laden with kiddos and diaper bags! Hardly ever do I consider it worth it to undergo the challenge of toting this stroller to and from when travelling or shopping. Additionally, it does not fold easily. And, unless you have abundant space in your vehicle, it is definitely not the stroller for you. Even folded, the stroller is so large that it dominates the space in my trunk, leaving little/no room for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: It Okay....
customer_reviews.text: Good enough. My 2 year old is too tall for the front. Her feet touch the ground and hit the wheels when she falls asleep. So we sit her in the back seat so her feet can freely dangle. Still, she's too tall for he backseat because she has to sit slouched. I like how the car seat clicks in perfectly. Easy to fold. Bulky, takes up entire trunk of Jeep. Also, the bottom storage is open from the back so things can easily slide out. Something to be careful about.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: This stroller has been pretty awesome! A couple of things I dislike are ...
customer_reviews.text: This stroller has been pretty awesome! A couple of things I dislike are that the basket is hard to access from he back of the stroller, and the shade cover for the front seat does not stay open very well when you do use it. It regularly starts closing or falls forward so we have it removed most of the time. Other than that we really like how easy it is to put up and down and we love how smooth and easy it is to push.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Approved by a 4 and 1 year old
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister and nephews, one age 4 other age 1, for a trip to Disney and the stroller was worth it from the airport through the trip to Disney and the beach!! It is pretty hard to take apart in order to convert the back seat into a standup seat but it was worth it for a trip such as. We were able to store a lot of stuff we bought at Disney as well.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! We use it all the time. It’s easy to fold, use, and maneuver. The basket at the bottom is a bit hard to access and doesn’t have as much room as I expected, but my kids love the stroller either way. Cup holders are convenient. Front seat is a bit more shallow than the back and doesn’t recline as much. I have my 2.5 year old in front and 5 year old in back.
customer_reviews.author: Bran Musick

customer_reviews.title: Great once rolling, but not easy to fold
customer_reviews.text: Great once it is unfolded and rolling, however the wheels prevent it from folding easy. Can be folded by one person with practice, but better to have someone assist with getting the wheels in the correct position to allow it to fold.
customer_reviews.author: Luke & Ashley Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the stroller a lot. The price is great! It is a bit top heavy, when walking on the sidewalk the driveway approaches really pull to the side and could have easily tipped over if I weren't holding it firmly. The wheels could also be better quality, they seem like plastic and a strange foam for the outer black tire part. Jogging is absolutely not possible with this as the wheels start rattling and spinning (but that is also not this type of strollers function design). Overall though it is a really attractive, versatile, good stroller, with a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: My little toddlersaurus Rex'  can't get out of it while I am shopping. 5 STARS
customer_reviews.text: It's a double stroller so it's big, bulky, and takes up my entire truck but it contains my little demons so I don't have to chase them endlessly through stores. 5 stars just cause of that reason. Its simple to put together unless your a man, then it takes 35 minutes of complaining until your wife swoops in and snaps it all together in 3 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 3 and 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: going strong for almost 5 years now. works great. worth it., the sitting option is amazing
customer_reviews.author: CrunchyMama&Wife

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The only I dont like is the wheels do seem cheap and already show wear on them after a few uses. It can be a bit temperamental to fold but I'm sure I'll get better at it the more I use it. The seats recline the way I need them as well as being upright as needed for different ages. Overall I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Go Packers

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller for the money
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my toddler and newborn. Little tough to steer sometimes but I’m used to a jogging stroller and we have our toddler in the front seat so the weight distribution is a little off. Only thing I wish was better is the storage. It’s a little difficult to get my diaper bag into the basket with the footrest of the back seat in the way.
customer_reviews.author: M.Hart

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller has been great for my toddler and newborn! I was nervous about buying because we have a different brand of car seat for our new born but it fits! What is nice too, is that there is a belt for extra protection to keep your car seat from falling out. There are a couple of cons but not too bad. It is really easy to pop out but it's a bit tricky to collapse. We knew this when buying that it would also be bulky and takes a most of our trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Marble

customer_reviews.title: Soooo heavy. I can barely push it. Husband ...
customer_reviews.text: Soooo heavy. I can barely push it. Husband has to push it for most of the time. Does not fit our graco infant seat, which I did not find out until later. Our two year old sits in front and her feet hang down too far. Not exactly what we needed, but we use it for walks around the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: CmomVT

customer_reviews.title: Good for two
customer_reviews.text: Good for two kids. I have a two and four year old. Good for airport and amusement park. Have enough room to hold everything. Very stiff and hard to maneuver when turning or just general steering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely a good work out
customer_reviews.text: Either I'm really weak or it is extra heavy to push with both babies inside. It's definitely a good work out, so it's nice when daddy is walking with us and can push while mommy walks along. It's also extra long but thats to be expected since it's for TWO instead of one. I am glad we got it for sure, and it's definitely been helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Not our favorite baby trend item
customer_reviews.text: Not our favorite baby trend item, but it works. It’s bulky and can be hard to steer, but I think part of that is just the fact that it’s a double stroller so it’s just larger. Seats don’t recline very far for smaller infants without the car seat. I do like the shades, versatility of the back seat for older riders, large cargo area, and easy use with infant car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Stroller broke mid-use and hurt my son
customer_reviews.text: This stroller broke when I was walking my boys into their daycare. The removable toddler seat came off suddenly despite my never removing it. My son fell back head first onto the hard tile floor. He cried for along time. I tried to return this stroller but the company said that there’s “nothing wrong with it” amd they mailed it back to me and provided no refund. Additionally this stroller is very long and clunky. I will have to dispose of this stroller as it’s too much of a safety hazard to donate anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Other reviewers noted a bad smell but there was none with my unit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandsons, 1 year apart. It pops up quickly and can fit into the trunk of a compact car. It is heavy if you had to carry it (why would you do that???) but it steers well and the car seat for the baby pops right on. I wish I had had one when my kids were little. Other reviewers noted a bad smell but there was none with my unit, just a plastic bag smell that went away once unwrapped. NOTE: the swing away trays are a bit tight at first, after a couple of uses, they become easier to open but remain secure when closed.
customer_reviews.author: MsJ

customer_reviews.title: Great but could be easier.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this stroller. I feel for a double stroller it’s definitely worth the price. The only reason I did 4 stars instead of 3 is because it takes quite a bit of work to go between two seats and the standing option and you have to really decide one way of the other because the seat doesn’t fit well in the bottom basket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... and both my 10 month old and toddler do great in this seat
customer_reviews.text: Have used for almost a year now and both my 10 month old and toddler do great in this seat. Only issue so far is the front foot rest seems to pop off and not want to go back in place when we collapse the stroller. I do wish the shoulder straps were a bit thicker or had some padding. When my son falls asleep they leave red marks on his neck.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Ethridge

customer_reviews.title: Low cost, durability
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is pretty durable and very affordable. Compare to many high end brands this stroller will last you longer as u can use it infants and toddlers. Also very helpful and useful thing about this stroller is that it stands when ita folded up.
customer_reviews.author: Jassi

customer_reviews.title: I’m satisfied with this
customer_reviews.text: Only wish I could fold it more compact that I would save more space in my car with this stroller, but I’m happy with its duration. I have 3 boys with 4,2years old and 3month. I like that I can choose which 2 would go in the stroller based on the occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Enna R

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research to pick the perfect double stroller for our family vacation and I am happy with this purchase. I love the different ways it can be used for my toddler to sit or stand. I will say it is rather heavy when collapsed, but that is to be expected with a large stroller. It was a great value compared to some other double strollers.
customer_reviews.author: kateykate35

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: - the wheels constantly fall off - you can't easily access the storage underneath because of the foot rest and how close the seats are to the net - connecting and disconnecting a carseat is a disaster - the oldest child has to sit up front because the backseat is too small but then all their weight in the front makes it very difficult to maneuver the stroller - it's huge and takes up so much space in the trunk - its difficult to collapse after use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this stroller because I have a baby trend car seat. I was pretty surprised at the quality of it when I got it. I was taken back by the fact that it had a tag sewn on it that said for "for display only, not for sale". But we have one child in a car seat and one child not, and the child who is not in the car seat has very limited room in the stroller. It's very cramped and not comfortable for our three-year-old. And when you try to collapse it you have to make sure the wheels are facing a certain direction otherwise you cannot get it closed. Not quite what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cockriel

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but great stroller.
customer_reviews.text: Being that I had my baby 2wks ago, this stroller too heavy to maneuver and makes me ache after using. Other than that, it's a great stroller and fits in department store aisles etc.
customer_reviews.author: Cali

product_meta.title: Baby Trend Sit and Stand Double Stroller, Onyx
product_meta.description: Color:Onyx| Style:Sit N Stand DoubleThe Sit N Stand is perfect for your growing family for many years from infant to toddler to growing child. One child can ride up front, and one can be behind, sleep, sit or stand! The Sit N Stand Double Stroller allows one child up front, and one behind who can either sit, or stand up just like mom and dad. Two canopies provide excellent sun protection for both little passengers and the rear canopy and child tray are removable when older children are ready to ride along. The stroller has a covered parent organizer with cup holders to keep your phone, keys and drink handy plus a large under seat storage basket holds everything you need for the day's activities. Car seats sold separately. Recommended User Ages: Front/Rear Seat: Travel system compatible or child sitting upright to 40 lbs. and Jump Seat/Standing: 2.5 years or 40 lbs. 21.5"W x 49"L x 43"H
feature_bullets: Children can sit in the front and rear seats of this stroller or stand on the rear platform
Removable rear seat converts stroller to traditional Sit N Stand
One hand fold is fast and easy to use, large basket for storage. To clean the seat pad, use only mild household soap or detergent and warm water on a sponge or clean cloth
Removable/Swing away child tray with cup holder, Covered parent tray with 2-cup holders
Accepts two infant car seats: Car Seats sold separately

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,410 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
